amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by the Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the modification to boating restrictions contained in the news release issued by the United States Fish and Wildlife Service entitled "Minor Modification to Boating Restrictions at Havasu Wildlife Refuge" and dated May 20, 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A097) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A097) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A097) offered by Mr. Gosar.
